articles.title: The Moment Mike Tyson Got So Emotional In An Interview He Told The Reporter To Leave - SPORTbible
articles.description: The former world heavyweight champion was talking about the death of his daughter and needed to get some space but was very polite.
articles.content:
Mike Tyson was so emotional in an interview he had to politely ask the interviewer to leave saying 'you understand' as he calmly walked away.
